item.description: Contradance with a local live band and caller. Dances taught- if you have contradanced before, you know how much fun it is! If this is new to you, contradancing is similar to squaredancing, with live music and a "caller" teaching the steps and patterns to each dance. You don't need a partner, just a willingness to have fun in a warm, friendly atmosphere!

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: St Patty's Contra Dance
